summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rezvo booking app iteration 3. All core features working correctly - landing page with new fonts (Space Grotesk/Plus Jakarta Sans), login flow, session persistence, signup flow, and navigation. Backend APIs 100% passing (12/12 tests). Fixed share link URL to use correct Rezvo domain.
passed_tests: Get current user with valid token (/auth/me)
Landing page loads with Rezvo branding
Landing page displays Space Grotesk and Plus Jakarta Sans fonts
Hero section with teal CTA button
Use case tabs (hairdressers, PTs, nail techs, etc.)
Login flow - form submission and redirect to dashboard
User data cached in localStorage as 'rezvo_user'
Session persistence - dashboard accessible after page reload
Navigation sidebar shows all 7 menu items (Dashboard, Calendar, Bookings, Services, Share Link, Analytics, Settings)
Signup flow creates new user and redirects to dashboard
updated_files: /app/backend/.env (added FRONTEND_URL for correct share link generation)
seed_data_creation: Created test user during signup flow test: test_1770219287@example.com
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working. Session persistence issue from previous iterations has been resolved. Share link now correctly uses rezvo-booking.preview.emergentagent.com domain. Fonts updated to Space Grotesk (headlines) and Plus Jakarta Sans (body) for Monzo/Starling aesthetic.
